sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Updates the reference_qual value on the sys_sg_screen_param_map table to reflect newest values</description>
        <name>Update item parameter reference_qual</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[function updateItemParameterReferenceQualifier() {
	gs.info('[updateItemParameterReferenceQualifier]: execution started');
	var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
	gr.addQuery('reference_qual','CONTAINS', "'parent=' + current.screen.data_item.sys_id;");
	gr.addQuery('name', 'sys_sg_screen_param_map');
	gr.addQuery('element', 'item_parameter');
	gr.query();

	while(gr.next()) {
		gs.info('[updateItemParameterReferenceQualifier]: next record');
		gr.setValue('reference_qual', "javascript: new GetScreenItemParametersQueryString().getItemParametersQS();");
		gr.setWorkflow(false);
		gr.update();
	}
}

gs.info('[updateItemParameterReferenceQualifier]: running script');
updateItemParameterReferenceQualifier();]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2019-09-16 15:39:04</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>6d06ff23533333003967ddeeff7b1218</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Update item parameter reference_qual</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Mobile plugin" source="com.glide.sg">2b3434a83c31311068bcf327dfe37fa3</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_6d06ff23533333003967ddeeff7b1218</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2019-09-16 15:40:01</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>true</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
